ygData.subject: Re: PoA Quests - do they work?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... go to eqcasters, i submit all the stuff our guild has done, so far some necromancer, druid, enchanter, cleric quests are all that we have completed. I
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:00 PM 2/25/2000 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
>My guild is planning to try the Anzarak (sp?) Island on Saturday. Heh, 9
>red to 50 mobs go agro... we'll see how it turns out. My one other trip
>there involved killing the fairies on the first island. There's a lot of
>crazy loots and some of them are mentioned in the bard quests. Has anyone
>done any of the quests? I presume that you kill stuff, loot for your quest
>items and then somehow make your way back to the first island and then the
>quest temple to turn in the items.
>
>Anyone ever do any PoA quests?
>
>Sylly
>
>

go to eqcasters, i submit all the stuff our guild has done, so far some
necromancer, druid, enchanter, cleric quests are all that we have
completed. I think we can do one bard quest, but we have to keep doing the
azarack isle and killing the boss there. Oh well, maybe tomorrow ;)

Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 Bard
Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 50 Necro
Colet Kruhsallis, lvl 34 Cleric
Tunare - Talisman - www.norrath.org
